description: A collection of fantastic sites to visit

sites.name: Codetogo
sites.description: Codetogo you can find code snippets for your projects. You can also share your code snippets with others. It's a great place to find inspiration for your next project. Its is for Javascript & React

sites.name: CSS Generator
sites.description: Css Generator is a collection of tools for web developers. You can find tools for generating CSS, SVG, and more.

sites.name: GitHub
sites.description: GitHub is a development platform inspired by the way you work. From open source to business, you can host and review code, manage projects, and build software alongside millions of other developers.

sites.name: MagicUi
sites.description: MagicUi is a collection of UI components for React, Angular, and Vue.

sites.name: Mui
sites.description: Mui is a popular React UI framework. It is a great place to find components for your next project.

sites.name: Stack Overflow
sites.description: Stack Overflow is the largest, most trusted online community for developers to learn, share their programming knowledge, and build their careers.

sites.name: shapedivider.app
sites.description: Shapedividier.app is a great place to find SVG shapes for your next project. You can customize the shapes to fit your needs.

sites.name: UiVerse
sites.description: UiVerse is a collection of UI components the are free to use. You can find components. The Components in HTML and CSS

sites.name: UI Beats
sites.description: UI Beats is a collection of Animated React Components and are open-source and free to use.

sites.name: WebCodeTools
sites.description: WebCodeTools is a collection of tools for web developers. You can find tools for generating CSS, SVG, and more.

sites.name: Web Gradients
sites.description: WebGradients is a free collection of 180 linear gradients that you can use as content backdrops in any part of your website.
